name: Lunar War
description:
You hate anime since childhood. You are in a city teeming with anime girls. Your task is to destroy all the girls. You have at your disposal a whole arsenal of weapons consisting of 6 units. The girls scattered throughout the city, you need to destroy them all.
Kill all the girls and go home.

  • 1 beautiful map
  • 6 types of weapons
  • Advanced AI
